nodes.text: The Church of Toydaria was a religious group connected to the Mid Rim world of Toydaria. It ran advertisements on HoloNet News during the Separatist Crisis that postulated, "Why? Why Not?" and claimed that the church welcomed all.

The Church of Toydaria was introduced in HoloNet News, an in-universe website published prior to the release of Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones. Advertisements for the religion ran throughout the numerous issues of HoloNet News.
